Buzz_Aldrin | was a crew member of | Apollo_11

lex.text: Buzz Aldrin was born on 20th January 1930 in Glen Ridge New Jersey. He graduated from MIT in 1963 and was a member of the Apollo 11 crew, operated by NASA. The back up pilot was William Anders.

sentence.striple: Buzz_Aldrin | almaMater | "Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Sc.D. 1963"
Buzz_Aldrin | was a crew member of | Apollo_11

lex.text: Buzz Aldrin was born January 20, 1930 in Glen Ridge, New Jersey. He graduated from M.I.T. with a Sc.D in 1963, and served as a crew member aboard NASA's @ Apollo 11, William Anders was a backup pilot on the same mission.
